content.raw:
The PR looks good to me until this point. We will need to add the brew formula and code for Windows.

I’m testing the current Linux compilation:

‌

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=2)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/2/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/2/))

‌

@nkoenig you can use the debbuild since it is now available here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign-gazebo-debbuilder/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign-gazebo-debbuilder/) \(just check that the daily run on DSL does not disable it before releasing\)
